channel.description: Recent content in lab on Ess Gee Labs

item.title: Build a Check Point Firewall Lab
item.description: Check Point is the most mature firewall in the industry. Here we install the firewall and management in a lab environment that you can use for testing or training.

item.title: Home Lab With Proxmox
item.description: A virtualisation server goes a long way when building your home lab. Consider Proxmox for your project.
